requirements.title: 2.1 Business Administrator Stories
requirements.description:
Epic: System Administration (FRD-2.1)

As a Business Administrator
I want to manage user access and permissions
So that I can maintain system security and compliance

requirements.title: 2.2 Department Manager Stories
requirements.description:
Epic: Team Management (FRD-2.2)

As a Department Manager
I want to monitor team performance metrics
So that I can optimize workflow efficiency

requirements.title: 3.1 User Management
requirements.description:
FRD-3.1: User Authentication
- Description: System must authenticate users using email/password
- Inputs: Email address, password
- Processing: Password hashing, session management
- Outputs: Authentication token, user session
- Error Handling: Invalid credentials, account lockout

requirements.title: 3.2 Workflow Automation
requirements.description:
FRD-3.3: Workflow Engine
- Description: Process automation system for business workflows
- Features:
  - Visual workflow designer
  - Task assignment
  - Status tracking
  - Approval routing

requirements.title: 4.1 Navigation Structure
4.2 Form Requirements
requirements.description:
FRD-4.2: Input Validation
- Required field indicators
- Real-time validation
- Error message display
- Field-level help text

requirements.title: 5.1 Data Model
requirements.description:
FRD-5.1: Core Entities
sql
CREATE TABLE users (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  roleid UUID REFERENCES roles(id),
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

requirements.title: 5.2 Data Validation
requirements.description:
FRD-5.2: Validation Rules
- Email format validation
- Required field checks
- Data type validation
- Business rule validation

requirements.title: 6.1 Workflow Rules
requirements.description:
FRD-6.1: Approval Process
1. Initiator submits request
2. Manager review required for amounts > $1000
3. Director approval required for amounts > $5000
4. Email notifications at each step
5. Audit trail maintenance

requirements.title: 6.2 Calculation Rules
requirements.description:
FRD-6.2: Performance Metrics
- Team efficiency = Tasks Completed / Time Spent
- Response Time = Average Resolution Duration
- Quality Score = (Success Cases / Total Cases)  100

requirements.title: 7.1 External APIs
8.1 User Management
requirements.description:
FRD-8.1: User Creation
- [ ] Admin can create new user accounts
- [ ] Required fields validated
- [ ] Welcome email sent
- [ ] Audit log entry created
- [ ] Password meets complexity requirements

requirements.title: 8.2 Workflow Management
requirements.description:
FRD-8.2: Workflow Execution
- [ ] Workflow steps execute in defined order
- [ ] Notifications sent to assigned users
- [ ] Status updates recorded
- [ ] SLA timers tracked
- [ ] Exception handling implemented

requirements.title: 2.1 Core Entities
requirements.description:
DRD-2.1: User
sql
User {
    id: UUID (PK)
    username: VARCHAR(50)
    email: VARCHAR(100)
    passwordhash: VARCHAR(256)
    status: ENUM('active','inactive','locked')
    createdat: TIMESTAMP
    updatedat: TIMESTAMP
}

requirements.title: 2.2 Relationship Entities
requirements.description:
DRD-2.4: UserRole
sql
UserRole {
    userid: UUID (FK)
    roleid: UUID (FK)
    assignedat: TIMESTAMP
    PRIMARY KEY(userid, roleid)
}

requirements.title: 2.2 Service Responsibilities
requirements.description:
| Service | Primary Responsibilities |
|---------|------------------------|
| API Gateway | Request routing, rate limiting, API documentation |
| Auth Service | Authentication, authorization, token management |
| User Service | User CRUD, role management, profiles |
| Workflow Service | Process automation, task management |
| Analytics Service | Reporting, metrics, data analysis |

requirements.title: Performance Guidelines
requirements.description:
1. Use memoized selectors for derived data
2. Implement shallow equality checks
3. Split state by domain for code splitting
4. Normalize relational data
5. Use RTK Query for API caching
